attributes.action: To stop Local and National Goverments every little excuse, to get the last bit of blood from us
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned are fully aware of what is going on..fool some of the people some time etc..


We are fed to the teeth, with Local and National Governments and their agencies, using every trick in the book and excuse to obtain our monies.

The Government is asking for a fairer, nicer culture within Brighton, then its up to the Govenment to stop robbing us, with there constand need to rob the public, with there petty fines, ie Gatos, dropping of cigerettes, it isnt a nanny state any more, its more like a Nazi state. I dont think even the Nazis employed, "FAG" watchers

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
